comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: It's Crash in Stake.com's original games. Not emptying your wallet? Oh yes, it can empty your wallet if you don't learn to control yourself. Winners here are those who can discipline themselves by cashing out at their planned amount multiplier. The last time I won at this game was months ago and I never went back. It's not because I lost a heavy amount of my capital, I actually won, but it's because of the long waiting that doesn't give you any wager amount. It means this game is for those who have the patience to wait because it can take a lot of time but for those who are trying to reach a certain VIP rank, this is not the way. 1 round could take a minute if it explodes to higher numbers. Then, there's the waiting time of all the players who will place their bets. 2 to 3 minutes per game which could probably be 30 rounds in Keno and 100 balls in Plinko. The thing about Crash is you have no idea when it will crash so you can end up losing a lot of money if you won't cash out at the right time.
